mapper.insert: insert into hz_hyper_disk (id, `name`, disk_size, stroage_type, cluster_id, creator_id, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diskSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stroageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update hz_hyper_disk set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disk_size = #{diskSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stroage_type = #{stroageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cluster_id = #{clusterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, disk_size, stroage_type, cluster_id, creator_id, create_time from hz_hyper_disk
